title: Prohibits the idling of motor vehicles left unattended
summary: Prohibits the idling of motor vehicles left unattended; provides exemptions; emergency of law enforcement purposes; maintenance, diagnostics, inspection; powering auxiliary equipment; recharging electric and hybrid vehicles; snow removal; weather conditions of less than twenty degrees Fahrenheit for more than twenty-four consecutive hours; within mines or quarries; farm vehicles; or remote starters.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to prohibiting the idling of motor vehicles left unattended
